title: How to Stop Sponge Rolls from Breaking or Cracking

steps.headline: Add one tablespoon of cornflour to a measuring cup.
steps.description: Take care to remove an equivalent tablespoon of flour from the amount required by the ingredients. The easiest way to do this is to fill a cup of flour on top of the tablespoon of cornflour and count that as one cup of flour. The ratio should be one tablespoon per cup of flour required.

steps.headline: Prepare the sponge roll mix according to your usual recipe.
Roll up as usual once cooked.
steps.description: You should find that the addition of the cornflour prevents the roll from cracking or breaking, making it much easier to roll.
